summary: This bill, the Dismantle Foreign Scam Syndicates Act, aims to combat transnational criminal syndicates operating online scam operations, particularly those originating from Southeast Asia and targeting Americans. It mandates the establishment of an interagency Task Force chaired by the Secretary of State to develop a comprehensive strategy to dismantle these operations. The strategy includes measures such as: bringing pressure on complicit foreign governments, investigating links to the PRC, imposing sanctions, recovering stolen assets, and supporting victims. The bill also authorizes appropriations for the Department of State for the implementation of the strategy.
